Text: TULSA, Okla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--NGL Energy Partners LP (NYSE: NGL) announced today that the Board of Directors of its general partner declared a distribution for the quarter ending September 30, 2019 to be paid to the holders of the Partnership's 9.00% Class B Fixed-to-Floating Rate Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Units (Class B Preferred Units) and the 9.625% Class C Fixed-to-Floating Rate Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Units (Class C Preferred Units) in accordance with the terms outlined in NGL's partnership agreement. Each of the Class B Preferred Units quarterly distribution of $0.5625 per unit and the Class C Preferred Units quarterly distribution of $0.60156 per unit will be made on October 15, 2019 to holders of record on October 1, 2019.
